casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Julio Zelaya SORTO. No. 206P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. J. Philip Allen, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*55The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Appeal of Right to N.C. Supreme Court from N.C. Court of Appeals for Interlocutory Appeal Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
